name: Hello Kitty, My Melody, Kuromi - Main Sanrio Characters

modelVersions.name: v1.0 Intial Release
modelVersions.description:
if kitty has a mouth it is because the dataset was extracted from GROWING UP WITH HELLO KITTY, it is not an error, it is intentional.

the model is ok, thing is i have no time now to make more samples, please help me with that on your reviews
